mapper.sql: recitePlan.book_id , recitePlan.user_id , recitePlan.plan_word_num , recitePlan.plan_phrase_num , recitePlan.total_word_num , recitePlan.total_phrase_num , recitePlan.recited_word_num , recitePlan.recited_phrase_num , recitePlan.repeat_times , recitePlan.clockin_id , recitePlan.clockin_times , recitePlan.recite_status , recitePlan.id , recitePlan.created_by , recitePlan.created_date , recitePlan.updated_by , recitePlan.updated_date , recitePlan.is_deleted
mapper.select: select from t_en_recite_plan_info recitePlan where is_deleted = 'N'
select from t_en_recite_plan_info recitePlan where is_deleted = 'N' and id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: update t_en_recite_plan_info set is_deleted = 'Y' where id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_en_recite_plan_info
book_id, user_id, plan_word_num, plan_phrase_num, total_word_num, total_phrase_num, recited_word_num, recited_phrase_num, repeat_times, clockin_id, clockin_times, recite_status, id, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date, is_deleted,
#{bookId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planWordNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{planPhraseNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalWordNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalPhraseNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recitedWordNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recitedPhraseNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{repeatTimes, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clockinId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clockinTimes, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reciteStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted, jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_en_recite_plan_info set
book_id = #{bookId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plan_word_num = #{planWordNum, jdbcType=INTEGER},
plan_phrase_num = #{planPhraseNum, jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_word_num = #{totalWordNum, jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_phrase_num = #{totalPhraseNum, jdbcType=INTEGER},
recited_word_num = #{recitedWordNum, jdbcType=INTEGER},
recited_phrase_num = #{recitedPhraseNum, jdbcType=INTEGER},
repeat_times = #{repeatTimes, jdbcType=INTEGER},
clockin_id = #{clockinId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
clockin_times = #{clockinTimes, jdbcType=INTEGER},
recite_status = #{reciteStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by = #{createdBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_date = #{createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_by = #{updatedBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated_date = #{updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{deleted, jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
